name: MeowSpace
description: Meowspace is a real-time chat platform designed for Web3 users, allowing communities to interact in token-gated environments. Inspired by social media platforms like Myspace, Meowspace enables users to create customizable profiles, host themed chat rooms, and participate in community-driven events. The project aims to move away from traditional platforms like Telegram and Discord by offering a more immersive and interactive space for online discussions, particularly within meme coin communities.
